**Facilities Maintenance and Support Services Tender**

**Notice: Tender Open**

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is inviting proposals from qualified firms to provide facilities maintenance and support services to the Department of National Defence (DND) at Canadian Forces Base Gagetown, New Brunswick.

**Background:**
The evaluation for the previous tender step has been completed, and proponents have achieved a minimum score of 40/60. As per Section 4.3.1 of the Request for Proposal (RFP), this milestone marks the beginning of the cost proposal submission phase.

** Submission Details:**

To proceed, proponents must submit a cost proposal via the MERX Electronic Bidding System by the closing date and time indicated on the system. Resubmitting the technical proposal is not required.

**Scope of Work:**

The winning contractor will be required to provide facilities maintenance and support services to all identified buildings and infrastructure within defined property limits. Services will be provided to maintain buildings in a condition that does not cause deterioration beyond normal wear and tear throughout the contract term.

**Contract Length and Value:**

The initial Period of Service will span four years, with possible extensions for up to two additional two-year periods and a final one-year extension. The estimated contract value is $67,500,000.

**Payment Information:**

The contractor will be remunerated according to a Lump Sum price, including:

* Mobilization - $150,000
* Annual Amount for the initial four-year Period of Service: $4,000,000 per year
* Annual Amount for each two-year Period of Extension: $5,600,000 per year

**Additional Information:**

Please refer to the RFP for detailed payment information and instructions on how to submit a cost proposal. You may access bidding and documents through the MERX Website.

**Contact Information:**

For any inquiry or clarification, please contact Craig Patterson at Craig.Patterson@dcc-cdc.gc.ca or 613-794-5311.

Thank you for reading this notice. We look forward to receiving your proposal.
